actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the programs of assistance for family planning and programs relating to genetic diseases.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize specified appropriations through fiscal year 1985 for: (1) family planning services, including training, research, and information and education; and (2) genetic disease testing, counseling, and information and education programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the programs of assistance for family planning and programs relating to genetic diseases.
